btkConvertGradientTable.cxx

00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include "itkImage.h"
00041 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00042 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00043 #include "btkDiffusionGradientTable.h"
00044 
00045 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00046 {
00047   try {
00048 
00049   // Parse arguments
00050   const char *inputImageFile = NULL, *gTableFile = NULL, *cTableFile = NULL; //, *dir = NULL;
00051 
00052   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Transform gradients from world to image coordinates.", ' ', "Unversioned");
00053 
00054   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Input image",true,"","string",cmd);
00055   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> gTableArg("g","gtable","Gradient table",true,"","string",cmd);
00056   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> cTableArg("c","ctable","Modified table",true,"","string",cmd);
00057 
00058   TCLAP::SwitchArg w2iSwitchArg("","w2i","Conversion is performed in the world to image direction (default)",cmd,false);
00059   TCLAP::SwitchArg i2wSwitchArg("","i2w","Conversion is performed in the image to world direction",cmd,false);
00060 
00061 //  TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> dirArg("d","direction","w2i converts from world to image coordinates;
00062 //  i2w converts from image to worls coordinates;",true,"","string",cmd);
00063 
00064   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00065 
00066   inputImageFile = inputArg.getValue().c_str();
00067   gTableFile     = gTableArg.getValue().c_str();
00068   cTableFile     = cTableArg.getValue().c_str();
00069 //  dir            = dirArg.getValue().c_str();
00070 
00071   const    unsigned int    Dimension = 4;
00072 
00073   // Read image
00074 
00075   typedef itk::Image< short, Dimension >  ImageType;
00076   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType > ImageReaderType;
00077   ImageReaderType::Pointer  imageReader  = ImageReaderType::New();
00078   imageReader -> SetFileName(  inputImageFile );
00079   imageReader -> Update();
00080   ImageType::Pointer image = imageReader->GetOutput();
00081 
00082   ImageType::SizeType size = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00083   ImageType::IndexType index = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00084   unsigned int numberOfFrames = size[3];
00085 
00086   // Modify gradient table
00087 
00088   typedef btk::DiffusionGradientTable< ImageType > GradientTableType;
00089   GradientTableType::Pointer gradientTable = GradientTableType::New();
00090 
00091   gradientTable -> SetNumberOfGradients(numberOfFrames);
00092   gradientTable -> SetImage( image );
00093   gradientTable -> LoadFromFile( gTableFile);
00094 
00095   if ( i2wSwitchArg.isSet() )
00096     gradientTable -> TransformGradientsToWorldCoordinates();
00097   else
00098     gradientTable -> TransformGradientsToImageCoordinates();
00099 
00100   gradientTable -> SaveToFile( cTableFile);
00101 
00102 
00103   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00104   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00105 
00106   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00107 }
